Test Case

Functional Requirement: Client wants to keep track of the  IP addresses from which users are logging in to SNC. Since that IP address is stored in the user record and overwritten by next login it is not very convenient for them to track IPs from sys_user table. They want a kind of log which will tell them who, when and from what IP address logged in to their SNC instance. Also  their security dept. wants to be notified when users from non-authorized IPs are logging in.

[] Create table "IP log" with fields:

 

  • User > reference to sys_user table
  • IP > text field, 40 chars
  • Authorized> checkbox (boolean), default = true

 

ACLs setup:

Create, Write, Delete - admin role

Read - itil role

[] Create table "Authorized IPs" with field:

 

  • IP, text field, 40 chars, always mandatory

 

Create, Write, Delete - admin role

Read - itil role

[] Add modules for these two tables to Incident application (on bottom) make sure those modules are set available to itil role holders

[] Choose event (session.established or login ???, check wiki or generate examples by logging in/out) and create Script Action that will perform the check against logged in user IP (authorized / non-authorized). For every user login it should create a record in IP log table populating "User", "IP" and "Authorized" fields. The check for authorized IP addresses should be as follows: for logged in user take his login device IP and check if it matches any record in Authorized IPs. If that is not the case then treat the IP as non-authorized and act accordingly (set flag to false, etc.)

Note: in order not to flood up the IP Log table with similar records please do not log same combinations of User-IP-Unauthorized if the record already exists in current date (according to the system time zone). Just send an email in that case and update 'sys_updated_on" system date/time field with the time of reoccurred event ( see GlideRecord method setForceUpdate(true))

[] If Authorized = false then an email should be sent to your Coach: with the following content:

Subject: Unauthorized Login: <IP> - <User Full Name>

Body:

-= start=-

An unauthrozed login detected for user <User Full Name>.

IP:<IP>

View Log entry: <link to IP Log record>

-= end=-

 

 

Trainee  Instructions

Please implement in the instance specified by Coach without proposing and getting approval for the technical design. Use separate update set. Perform the unit testing before reporting task as completed to the Coach.  

 

 

Coach Instructions

Make strict review of the update set and the code from the Best Practice use.  Review issues, mistakes with the Trainee and provide the feedback on the overall exercise completion (perfect, good, average, bad).
